title: Had pulsefire ezreal for a long time, don't have the icon
body:
Had pulsefire ezreal for a long time, don't have the icon. Asked some people who had it and they said that you get the icon if you had the skin before the vfx. 

Is there a way I could get it?

replies.body: You should have both the Ezreal and Time Portal icons, but it's strange you didn't receive yours.  No worries, I've added it to your account!
